snippet: The Big East Conference will announce the addition of the University of Memphis on Wednesday, bolstering the league’s basketball prospects in the wake of losing Pittsburgh, Syracuse and West Virginia.
abstract: Big East Conference will announce the addition of the University of Memphis for all sports, bolstering the league’s basketball prospects in the wake of losing Pittsburgh, Syracuse and West Virginia; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Big East Conference will announce the addition of the University of Memphis on Wednesday, bolstering the league’s basketball prospects in the wake of losing Pittsburgh, Syracuse and West Virginia.

headline.main: Big East Adds Memphis for All Sports
headline.print_headline: Big East Adds Memphis for All Sports
